metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010024 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** GNU Libc current is affected by: Mitigation bypass. Theimpact is: Attacker may bypass ASLR using cache of thread stack and heap.The component is: glibc. NOTE: Upstream comments indicate "this is beingtreated as a non-security bug and no real threat."

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
